ESC_RAW_RECORDER

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
WIDGET Procedure:
  esc_raw_recorder
PURPOSE:
 Widget tool that opens a socket and records streaming data from a server (host) and can save it to a file
 or send to a user specified routine. This tool runs in the background.
 Keywords:
   SET_FILE_TIMERES : defines how often the current output file will be closed and a new one will be opened
   DIRECTORY:  string prepended to fileformat when opening an output file.
 Author:
    Davin Larson - April 2011
    Roberto Livi - April 2023

 $LastChangedBy: rlivi04 $
 $LastChangedDate: 2023-04-25 10:00:18 -0700 (Tue, 25 Apr 2023) $
 $LastChangedRevision: 31794 $
 $URL: svn+ssh://thmsvn@ambrosia.ssl.berkeley.edu/repos/spdsoft/trunk/projects/escapade/esa/common/esc_raw_recorder.pro $

(See projects/escapade/esa/common/esc_raw_recorder.pro)

ESC_RECORDER

 [Previous Routine] [List of Routines] 
WIDGET Procedure:
  esc_recorder
PURPOSE:
 Widget tool that opens a socket and records streaming data from a server (host) and can save it to a file
 or send to a user specified routine. This tool runs in the background.
 Keywords:
   SET_FILE_TIMERES : defines how often the current output file will be closed and a new one will be opened
   DIRECTORY:  string prepended to fileformat when opening an output file.
 Author:
    Davin Larson - April 2011
